ruok.quality.globalquality.tooltip: Adjusting this will decrease/increase render distance, graphics quality, particle effects, etc.
ruok.quality.autoquality.tooltip: This setting will automatically configure based on your computer's performance every 30 seconds after entering the game (total of 6 times).
ruok.quality.renderlivingdistance.toolti: Based on the value you set, render only entities within a cubic radius of your chosen value.
ruok.quality.renderlivingentity.tooltip: Based on your 'Render Living/Entity Distance' setting, this determines the number of entities currently being rendered.
ruok.quality.rendermangroveroots.tooltip: Cull mangrove roots from inside rendering
ruok.key.value.error.max: Unable to add/remove, value is at maximum/minimum!
ruok.benchmark.value: Benchmark completed. Your current score is:
ruok.quality.renderweathernetwork.toolti: Disabling this will turn off network packet modifications related to rain and snow.
ruok.quality.renderlighting.tooltip: Enabling this will turn on lighting updates, otherwise, it will turn off lighting updates.
ruok.quality.renderentitytick.tooltip: Default is 20; higher values make entities update slower.
ruok.quality.renderentityentity.tooltip: Based on your 'Render Living/Entity Distance' setting, this determines the number of entities currently being rendered.
ruok.quality.renderfastitem.tooltip: Changes item rendering to be aligned with the player's head (actually a BUG, but it's <funny>, so it's kept, also kind of an optimization).
